cardContent.heading: Frontend
cardContent.body: Focused on Frontend Development and primarily working with JavaScript and React

cardContent.heading: Backend
cardContent.body: While building out Full Stack Applications i gained good knowledge of working with API's and Databases

cardContent.heading: Improvement
cardContent.body: I especially enjoy learning and improving myself, to make life easier for myself and everyone around me

personalText: My name is Sandro Pernerstorfer and i'm a Web Developer from Austria, Vienna.
Curious and driven by everything logical and technical whilst appreciating creativity and freedom to create magical things.
I started my journey in the Electrical Engineering field, working and solving problems in various environments and situations.
Since i always enjoyed programming electrical solutions the inevitable happened and i fell in love with Software Development.
Learning the ins and outs of the web, and using modern web technologies to solve problems and create solutions.
